body: Fundamentals haven't changed.
Fiat money is still broken.
Blocks are still coming in.
Fiat money is still stealing from you. Bitcoin is not.
Bitcoiners are still awesome.
Bitcoin still refuses to care.
Difficulty adjustment still works as intended.
The amount of bitcoin created is still below 21 million.
Bitcoin still works as intended.
There will never be more than 2,099,999,997,690,000 sats. If you have some, you're ahead of the curve. Now go get some more.
Bitcoin still isn't dead.
We are one day closer to Hyperbitcoinization.
$BLOCKSTOHALVING blocks until the next halving.
This is the $REWARDERAth reward era. $REWARDERASTOGO more to go.
Still $BLOCKSUNTIL21 blocks to go until all the sats are mined.
The time is $BLOCKHEIGHT and it's a beautiful day in cyberspace.
A lot of people bought bitcoin today.
It's a beautiful day to stack some sats.
Bitcoin is operating like clockwork.
The money printers are still printing money like mad.
Fiat money continues to lose purchasing power.
If you zoom out far enough you can only be one thing:
Every day new bitcoiners are born.
We are one day closer to a circular bitcoin economy.
Can you hear it? Tick-tock. Tick-tock. Tick-tock. Next block.
I love the smell of freshly stacked sats in the morning.
